Franck Abd-Bakar Fanny (1970– July 3, 2021) bụ onye Ivory Coast na-ese foto.
N'afọ 2013 Fanny bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà anọ ahọpụtara ịnọchite anya Ivory Coast na 55th Venice Biennale

N'afọ 2014, a gụnyere ya na ihe ngosi The Divine Comedy: Heaven, Purgatory, and Hell Revisited by Contemporary African Artists, nke gara na SCAD Museum of Art na Savannah, Georgia, na Smithsonian's National Museum of African Art, Washington, D.C.. N'afọ 2018 ọ natara ihe nrite Prix de l'Uemoa na mmemme Dak'Art nke iri na atọ.
Ọ nwụrụ na Julaị 2, 2021 na Abidjan.
